title: Why Can’t He Take A Hint
itunes:title: Why Can’t He Take A Hint
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m recently divorced and in the process of rebuilding my life, my ex-husband has been in my face and in my space too much. I had to stop talking to him altogether in the past few weeks because he’s still acting as if he’s my man. He did move me into my new place and got an additional key made just in case I had an emergency. We are both very cautious people so I didn’t think it was strange for him to have a key.......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m recently divorced and in the process of rebuilding my life, my ex-husband has been in my face and in my space too much. I had to stop talking to him altogether in the past few weeks because he’s still acting as if he’s my man. He did move me into my new place and got an additional key made just in case I had an emergency. We are both very cautious people so I didn’t think it was strange for him to have a key.......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
